column4: Do you guys have any idea to go to the home folder of the main user on the system?
the best I've thought of so far is cd /home/[^l]*
umm, I really don't get what you're saying.  What do you mean by "Looking for new hardware"
while booting it just stops  for long time saying detecting hardware ..
that's not looking for new hardware, it's activating what's in the computer, more than likely
does this happen every time you boot?
well, I don't know how to stop that.  Never heard of it
i am sure my laptop shouldn't take that much time .. looking for a way to tweak it
i think we are on the same boat then
hmm.. my slax on the flash drive takes 35 sec
